Literature.Title: De novo design of selective antibiotic peptides by incorporation of unnatural amino acids.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Bhonsle JB, Venugopal D, Koser BW, Magill AJ

Literature.Title: NOVEL ANTI-MICROBIAL PEPTIDOMIMETIC COMPOUNDS AND METHODS TO CALCULATE ANTI-MICROBIAL ACTIVITY
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Venugopal D, Bhonsle JB

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(no activity data),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=60µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 43223(MIC=20µg/ml),Francisella tularensis SCHU-S4(MIC=250µg/ml),Bacillus anthracis Ames(MIC=0.98µg/ml),Brucella melitensis 16M(MIC=>500µg/ml),Yersinia pestis C092(MIC=31.25µg/ml)
